column4: No required driver detected for unity  any help with this error... im trying to run ubuntu 10.10 netbook

what card do you have?
yes
im not sure
how would i check?
lspci or check your laptop's documentation
i ran tht in the terminal now what would my video card be under?
lspci | grep -i vga
ATI Technologies Inc M52 [Mobility Radeon X1300]
go to System -> Administration -> Additional Drivers
one moment.

no drivers are listed
